alert.note: Alert for Marion; Schley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 09 at 7:52AM EST until March 09 at 8:15AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EST FOR EAST CENTRAL MARION AND WEST CENTRAL SCHLEY COUNTIES... At 751 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Putnam, or near Ellaville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Ellaville, Putnam, Doyle and Walls Crossing. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
